title: REAL TALK *** HOW BROKEN IS ILLAOI ?!
body: Maaaaaan Come on riot ! seriously... just why... maybe it would be wise to adjust her power/ scaling a little bit? She is so broken, 1, her tentacles grab u and if u try to fight her more tentacles hit you. oh ! and if u run away from the soul reaping ability ( Sorry i dont know what it's called) guess what ?! u get hit with more tentacles !!! BRUH u just can't win. Plis as contradicting as this may sound but pls.. Rito im not saying nerf" but pls nerf.

replies.body: You dodge her tentacle smash, and stay behind minions in your lane so she cant rip your spirit out, and you've beat her, congrats.

Although Illaoi may seem broken, in most circumstances she can be easily outplayed. Yes her scaling is a bit high so if she gets a lead she will annihilate. Second of all she falls off bad late game. So quit your complaining.
Just play nasus into her and stack of her tentacles

nice votes mate, all options besides the one you don't want to hear. 

ive played Master Yi top and smashed her.
